name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
description: A bisque that can be found everywhere. Blend cooked ingredients until they are liquefied, and heat the soup with cream until it is thickened up — voila! A simple dish that warms your stomach as well as your heart.

suspicious.name: Suspicious Cream of Mushroom Soup
suspicious.description: A bisque that can be found everywhere. A small sip, and the weird taste already freezes you. You can't help but pray: "Archons above, please tell me it's not dirt that I'm tasting..."
suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.

normal.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
normal.description: A bisque that can be found everywhere. Blend cooked ingredients until they are liquefied, and heat the soup with cream until it is thickened up — voila! A simple dish that warms your stomach as well as your heart.
normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.

delicious.name: Delicious Cream of Mushroom Soup
delicious.description: A bisque that can be found everywhere. Its creamy texture feels like a silky garment, and you seem to be dancing on the stage in this beautiful attire... The curtain has fallen, but the memory lingers.
delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.
